<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_697264_iplookup2_ipaddressinfo</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_697264_iplookup2_ipaddressinfo">null<item endquery="false" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate IP Address City</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	try { 
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_697264_iplookup2.IPInfo', 'Default GET');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('ipaddress', 'current.ip_address');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('specific_field', 'geo');

		var responseObj = JSON.parse(responseBody);

		current.city = responseObj.city;
		gs.info("City = " + current.city);
		
		current.update();

		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
	}
	catch(ex) {
		gs.info("Uncaught error: " + err);
		var message = ex.message;
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-26 08:22:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9d162e1e83ab6210173ef865eeaad397</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate IP Address City</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IPLookup2" source="x_697264_iplookup2">0e43ee9283ab6210173ef865eeaad31d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IPLookup2">0e43ee9283ab6210173ef865eeaad31d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9d162e1e83ab6210173ef865eeaad397</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-26 08:44:13</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9d162e1e83ab6210173ef865eeaad397"/></record_update>
